# Beget Bogun (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M, XP

**Range:** Touch

**Effect:** Tiny construct

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 26

*With the bogun made, you take the final step and imbue it with sentience, breathing life into your new servant and companion.*

*Beget bogun* allows you to infuse living magic into a small mannequin that you have created from vegetable matter. This is the final spell in the process of creating a bogun. See the bogunâ€™s description for further details.

*Material Component:* The mannequin from which the bogun is created.

*XP Cost:* 25 XP.
